name: Pencilmation quest - Brain up
description:
Pencilmation quest is a fun and creative game, You will be transformed into a guy with the power of wisdom, courage and love to rescue your fiancée. Think to solve challenging puzzles, you can fall into the maze with love from the puzzles of the game. The game will always bring you joy and facial radiance.

Enjoy the game without worrying, besides the main game mode, there are up to 3 other game modes:
* Pull the pin - Pencil Boy Rescue : Use your brain and calculations to kill monsters, pull out the pins one by one, active trap to loot treasures or rescue your fiancee with the traps arranged in the game screen.

* Treasure Robber Mode: Your only task is to capture the thief with ingenuity when using the traps in the game screen

* Stick hero draw ( draw line puzzle ) Mode: Combining puzzle and drawing, players see and feel to overcome the puzzles. The puzzles will enrich your imagination.

FEATURES
-Over 500 levels and always updated.
-Simple and addictive
- Fun and educational suitable for all ages
-The game is very simple, everything depends on your thinking
-The puzzles will enrich your imagination and passion of discovery
-Check your IQ score with Hero Rescue: How to steal and pull the peg - Pull him out
- Attractive reward.
- Great graphics!

Are you ready? Let's go !!!
publishers: SOFT VIET DEVELOPMENT TECHNOLOGY AND INVESTMENT COMPANY
